title: (x) Monster energy drink logo - hand drawn {Mike Diaz}
content:
Can anyone tell me what this font is?  
It is used on the monster energy drink.  
Thx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090830232024im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mnster_6301.jpg)
author: omega81

comments.content:
I’m certain this hand-done- custom for sure.

Mikey

damn well that sucks =P

Any font similar to this one that you know about?

hmm off the top of head it has an asian influence but also old english black letter too... Origami and Mexica come to mind but also virusfonts.com stuff too.

Sorry I’m not very helpful,

Mike :-(
